file_content.text: The Dread Masters will turn the war in our favor. The Emperor thanks you, as do I.
Welcome, my lord. Your assistance has proven invaluable, just as the Emperor foresaw.
Welcome, agent. I wanted to personally commend your performance.
You have surpassed all expectations, hunter.
Impressed does not begin to describe my respect for your actions on Belsavis.
The Dread Masters are safe. In freeing them, you have truly accomplished the Emperor's vision.
Even the Esh-kha's fiercest leader fell to my lightsaber.
I dominate all life.
Belsavis will forever bear your mark.
Confronting pure terror was a joy--one I'm still relishing.
It was my pleasure.
That is quite interesting, my lord. And not at all unexpected.
Prison security is never perfect. Infiltration simply requires the proper touch.
Hard but not impossible.
I will take your word for it, agent.
I'm worth every credit. And the Dread Masters were an expensive contract.
You get what you pay for.
The Dread Masters have a temper. Try not to anger them.
Be careful around them.
Naturally. But thank you for the advice.
I prefer more tangible thanks.
I agree completely. Compensation has already been arranged.
It goes without saying that all events on Belsavis are strictly confidential. Especially those pertaining to the Esh-kha.
But enough formalities. With the Dread Masters freed, the galaxy will know fear once more. The Emperor thanks you--for everything.
The Emperor watches your progress. Do not fail him.
Approach. You have garnered the attention of my master, the Emperor.
He foresees you performing great deeds on Belsavis, and he sends this message: Do not disappoint him.
People call me lord. You should as well.
Speak with respect.
The Imperial Guard speak with the Emperor's command. We bow to no other. That said, welcome to Belsavis.
You're an Imperial Guard. Am I supposed to salute or bow?
Explain your rank and status.
Prostrate yourself as you see fit. Just remember, you're allowed on Belsavis at my request.
If he gave me an objective to fulfill, it would help.
Did he give specifics?
In time. First familiarize yourself with the Belsavis system.
If the Emperor requests my services, he'll have them.
Understood, sir.
I had heard of your body count, few speak of your humility. Welcome to the Belsavis system.
This planet holds the Republic's dirtiest secret: a maximum security prison, home to the galaxy's most depraved convicts.
We've come to free them. Specifically the Dread Masters--elder Sith who could change the course of the war.
Such important prisoners will be under tight security. I can help.
I could be of service.
Excellent. But you won't be alone. We've deployed a heavy Imperial presence, led by five special operations groups.
The Empire's risking much to free these Sith. Why?
What makes them so important?
The Dread Masters possess the unique ability to cripple an entire enemy force with terror. We've deployed special operations groups to release them.
There's nothing like a good old-fashioned prison break.
Sounds fun.
Belsavis is no playground. We've already deployed special operations groups to free the elder Sith.
They've freed prisoners and sparked riots. But during the chaos, we lost contact with all five teams.
You will need to re-establish contact, and if necessary, relaunch the operation to free the Dread Masters.
The Republic will pay for jailing the Dark Lords.
The prison will hold no Sith.
Vengeance is good, if it does not blind you. I believe you are ready for Belsavis.
I like the idea of Sith Lords owing their freedom to me.
Sounds enticing.
Sounds pretty involved. Raise the bounty, and we're in business.
Make an offer, and I'm in.
Be assured, the Empire highly values these captives.
There's not a prison built that I can't crack.
I can extract anyone.
Springing these Sith won't be easy. I can try, but no promises.
I'll give it a shot.
The Emperor is taking a personal interest in this operation. I suggest you do more than try.
I won't even break a sweat.
Belsavis is the most secure prison in the galaxy. I doubt you'll find it an easy conquest.
A shuttle will drop you at the last known location of Operations Group Five. Find Lord Medechas, help him fan the flames of the riot.
Minimum resources, maximum results. That's how we avoid disappointing the Emperor.
I am here at the Emperor's behest. Do not interfere.
